info.name: Grafana
info.description:
Public documentation: https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/http_api/

Quick start TIG stack using Docker: https://github.com/nickrusso42518/tig-stack

Some requests only work with HTTP basic auth, so most requests in this collection use it.

item.name: Get API keys using API key for auth

response.name: Success: both entries
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 2,
        "orgId": 1,
        "name": "AWS CloudWatch",
        "type": "cloudwatch",
        "typeLogoUrl": "public/app/plugins/datasource/cloudwatch/img/amazon-web-services.png",
        "access": "proxy",
        "url": "http://monitoring.us-west-1.amazonaws.com",
        "password": "",
        "user": "",
        "database": "",
        "basicAuth": false,
        "isDefault": false,
        "jsonData": {
            "authType": "keys",
            "defaultRegion": "us-west-1"
        },
        "readOnly": false
    },
    {
        "id": 1,
        "orgId": 1,
        "name": "Docker InfluxDB",
        "type": "influxdb",
        "typeLogoUrl": "public/app/plugins/datasource/influxdb/img/influxdb_logo.svg",
        "access": "proxy",
        "url": "http://influxdb:8086",
        "password": "grafana",
        "user": "grafana",
        "database": "telegraf",
        "basicAuth": false,
        "isDefault": false,
        "jsonData": {},
        "readOnly": false
    }
]

response.name: Failure: already exists
Success
response.body:
{
    "datasource": {
        "id": 2,
        "orgId": 1,
        "name": "AWS CloudWatch",
        "type": "cloudwatch",
        "typeLogoUrl": "",
        "access": "proxy",
        "url": "http://monitoring.us-west-1.amazonaws.com",
        "password": "",
        "user": "",
        "database": "",
        "basicAuth": false,
        "basicAuthUser": "",
        "basicAuthPassword": "",
        "withCredentials": false,
        "isDefault": false,
        "jsonData": {
            "authType": "keys",
            "defaultRegion": "us-west-1"
        },
        "secureJsonFields": {
            "accessKey": true,
            "secretKey": true
        },
        "version": 1,
        "readOnly": false
    },
    "id": 2,
    "message": "Datasource added",
    "name": "AWS CloudWatch"
}

response.name: Success
response.body:
